titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt to William J. Moores
CWG13716

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 3

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To William J. Moores Dr.

Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno. W. Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
Forty One Dollars & Sixty oneSix cents
I certify that the above account is correct and just; and that the articles were furnished as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.
Jones A Crawford, Lut & A Q M 2 & D Batts 14 Ky Cavl

Received at Frankfort on, the 20th of March, 1863, of John W. Finnell, Quarter-master Adjutant General Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Forty one -- Dollars and sixty six Cents, in full of the above account.

16. no. 39
NO. 12.
No. 65 Abstract B A Qr. 186
Wm. J. Moores
Dollars $4166/100
Paid Aug 8 1863
Allowed Aug 8 1863
J212
J10 J. W. F.
16
